alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:29PM EDT until June 29 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN WHITE...SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE...SOUTHWESTERN WABASH... SOUTHERN EDWARDS AND WEST CENTRAL POSEY COUNTIES... At 328 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Albion, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carmi, Albion, Grayville, Crossville, Browns, Golden Gate, Burnt Prairie and Phillipstown. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 115 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
